page.title: 19Nuthall Children at Leisure
page.content: Here are some of the unusual things that we do in our spare time. In my spare time I go to{antique {fairs}with my mum and dad. We go in our car. When you go in you have to pay about 30p. Inside there are rows of stalls. On the stalls there are old bowls, poys and sometimes stamps. You can walk around the stalls. my parents collect Toby jugs. Here are the names of some of the jugs. Old Charley, Robin, The Three Musketeers. ------- On Sundays I go{B.M.X. racing.}I race for a team called Bunny's G.T. We used to be the best shop team in Britain. I race in the 8 year olds group. Last week it was the British Championships, at Derby. I made it through my three heats, called moto's, and my semi-finals. In the final I came fifth.
